name: FARMetl™ Molybdenum (III) Acetylacetonate (14284-90-3)
description: FARMetl™ Molybdenum (III) Acetylacetonate is a product in the FARMetl™ line of acetylacetonate products that are commonly used as catalysts and crosslinkers in paints/coatings, polyurethane elastomers and foams, solvent-based pressure sensitive adhesives, specialty chemical processing, and other applications. Our FARMetl™ line includes acetylacetonates of aluminum, nickel, iron, cobalt, zinc, and zirconium, as well as a variety of other metal acetylacetonates.
